name: SPX Corporation
description: SPX Corporation is a diversified global supplier of highly engineered, specialized solutions. Founded in 1911 and headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, SPX Corporation operates through two primary segments: Detection & Measurement and HVAC. The company is recognized for its innovative products and services in critical industries including utilities, telecommunications, food and beverage, and commercial heating and cooling. SPX’s Detection & Measurement segment offers advanced solutions for diagnostics and testing, while its HVAC segment provides energy-efficient heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems. SPX Corporation is committed to sustainability and continuous improvement, leveraging technology to deliver high-quality products that enhance operational efficiency and reduce environmental impact. With a dedicated workforce and a focus on customer satisfaction, SPX aims to be a trusted partner for its clients, delivering solutions that meet their evolving needs. The company has a strong track record of strategic acquisitions and investments that bolster its capabilities and market presence, positioning it as a leader in its field.
